content: if you love crochet stash busting and quick and easy projects you re going to love this two-for-one fingerless glove and mitten pattern the stria gloves and stria mittens are designed for advanced beginners and can be customized to perfectly fit any adult this gorgeous design is perfect in solids or in varied colors and is great if you have a skein of worsted weight yarn that s begging to be used these make awesome stocking stuffers teacher gifts or market items you ll need no more than 200 yards of yarn to complete a whole pair and they ll look fantastic when you re done this pattern was featured on the clover usa blog on december 29 2020 the stria gloves and stria mittens pattern was designed written and photographed by amy cornett of ©the acorn craft shop you may not sell share or alter any part of these patterns or pictures to use as your own please feel free to make and sell finished products but use your own photographs and credit the acorn craft shop for the pattern happy crocheting
